statements.select: select StationName from Pub_ServiceStation where Status=1 and StationCode='$StationCode$'

select o.OldManId,o.OldManName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetGenderName(o.Gender) GenderName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetRealAge(o.IDNo) Age,o.IDNo,ac.ICNo,o.Address,o.InputCode1 from Oca_OldManBaseInfo o left join Pub_ServiceStation s on o.StationId=s.StationId left join Pam_AgencyObjectConfigInfo ac on o.OldManId=ac.OldManId and s.StationId=ac.StationId where o.Status=3 and s.Status=1 and s.StationCode='$StationCode$'

select o.OldManId ,o.OldManName ,bm.BookDate,bm.MealType ,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('13003',bm.MealType) MealTypeName,sm.SetMealId,sm.SetMealName ,sm.SetMealContent,bm.FetchFlag ,case bm.FetchFlag when 0 then '未取' else '已取' end FetchFlagName from Pam_BookMeal bm left join Pam_SetMeal sm on bm.SetMealId=sm.SetMealId left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo o on bm.OldManId=o.OldManId left join Pub_ServiceStation s on o.StationId=s.StationId and bm.StationId=s.StationId where bm.Status=1 and sm.Status=1 and DATEDIFF(D,bm.BookDate,GETDATE())=0 and s.StationCode=#StationCode# order by o.OldManName asc

select d.DeviceName,b.CourseName,substring(CONVERT(varchar,b.BeginTime,108),1,5) as BeginTime,case when substring(CONVERT(varchar,b.BeginTime,108),1,2)<12 then 'AM' else 'PM' end as AMPM ,b.CourseDuration, SUBSTRING(b.CourseInfo,CHARINDEX('|',b.CourseInfo,1)+1,CHARINDEX('|',b.CourseInfo,CHARINDEX('|',b.CourseInfo,1)+1)-CHARINDEX('|',b.CourseInfo,1)-1) CourseImg from Pub_ServiceStation a inner join Pam_CourseSchedule b on a.StationId=b.StationId and b.Status=1 inner join Pam_Device c on b.DeviceId=c.DeviceId and c.Status=1 inner join Pub_Device d on c.DeviceId=d.DeviceId and d.Status=1 and d.DeviceType='00012' and datediff(d,b.BeginTime,getdate())=0
a.StationCode=#StationCode#
order by b.DeviceId,b.BeginTime desc
